                                                Locator Resources National level Policy State level Policies Electricity Cost for charging Standards and Specifications Reports and Articles Media Useful Links Skill Centre International Best Practices on Policies Template for State Level EV Awareness portal Support FAQs Share Your Content Tax Savings Calculator Switching to EVs is not only cost-effective, but they also have tax advantages in India. The government created a new section that includes tax benefits on Electric Vehicles in India.
                        
                        The Tax Savings Calculator helps to calculate how much amount in tax would be saved if a person switches from a conventional Vehicle to an EV. Should I shift to electric vehicle? Vehicle Segment Select 2W (Two-Wheeler) 3W (Three-Wheeler) 4W (Four-Wheeler) Base Amount of Vehicle ₹ Enter
                                                    valid numeric value only Conventional Vehicle GST % Enter
                                                    valid numeric value only Electric Vehicle GST % Enter
                                                    valid numeric value only Calculate Total
